attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this will mean that the working women will be better protected, and have to pay taxes. whilst the government can legislate for well run brothels, these will have to comply with h&s legislation etc. this will in turn make for a safer working environment for the working women.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
